entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Microsoft.Dotnet.Compatibility analyzer doesn't work with the NumericIntPtr feature #25566
  • [API Compat] add triple slash comments on all rules #25565
  • unify error message style across rules #25564
  • Migrate Razor SDK to razor-compiler #25561
  • "Permission denied" when running `dotnet script` if the current working directory contains a file named `dotnet` #25551

Closed

  • CoreCLR failed to build with error NETSDK1182 with MSVC on windows amd64. #25005
  • How to let MSBuildLocator.RegisterDefaults find a local SDK installation (not on PATH) #24691
  • --runtime or --use-current-runtime with --sc or --selfcontained gives warning warning NETSDK1179: One of '--self-contained' or '--no-self -contained' options are required when '--runtime' is used. #25300

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1782315 #25567
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove format command options #25562
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Update the RID target from lower win to the latest one #25526
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove dotnet-format option parsing and have them pass-through. #25541
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • add rule to make sure enum values match #25542
    Area-Compatibility
  • Update the hardcoded netcoreapp1.1 to the current framework #25350
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the hardcoded netcoreapp1.0 to the current framework #25476
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Cache pipeline inputs when suppressed: #24928
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #25522
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [dotnet-watch] Fixes an infinite loop of reloads when the process fails to start #25533
    Servicing-approved, Area-AspNetCore
  • [dotnet-watch] Updates the request path to always be host relative #25534
    Servicing-approved, Area-AspNetCore
  • Set the Framework and Runtime options as required for 'dotnet store' #25435
    Area-Infrastructure
